Ridgeline Labs Inc. has been accepted into Play Labs first VR accelerator batch!

Versatile

We build applications for multiple VR platforms, including Vive, Oculus, and Cardboard/Daydream.

Skilled

Our skills and experience span across multiple disciplines, including programming, art, and game design. Whether it be working with Unity, writing C#, or modelling custom 3D assets, we got it covered.

Impactful

We believe that VR will dramatically change the way humans interact with each other and the world. We take pride in building experiences that move people at an emotional level.

Our Project - RoVR


An interactive pet experience for the HTC Vive. Users will be able to
groom, train and play with their own pet in a fully explorable environment.
